step1.title: Welcome to CyprusEye Quest! üéâ
step1.description: Discover the quick actions in the header. From here you have instant access to: üì¶ Packing, üéÅ Coupon, üöó Car rental, üó∫Ô∏è Trips, üè® Hotels. Everything is one tap away.

step2.title: Tabs navigation üóÇÔ∏è
step2.description: These are the main app tabs: üó∫Ô∏è Adventure (map & check-ins), üë• Community, üìö Recommendations, üìù Tasks. Tap a tab to switch views.

step3.title: Interactive map of Cyprus üó∫Ô∏è
step3.description: Explore places on the map, read descriptions, and see photos and comments. Check in at places to earn XP, levels, and badges. Tap the pins on the map.

step4.title: Current place and check-in üìç
step4.description: This panel shows where you are now, how much XP you will earn, and lets you quickly check in, open comments, or zoom the map to this place.

step5.title: Trips and attractions üó∫Ô∏è
step5.description: Choose a city to see the best trips and prices, then go to the full list to book your spot.

step6.title: Stays in Cyprus üè®
step6.description: Hotels, villas, and apartments organised by location. Browse the cards and open details to book your accommodation.

step7.title: Our discounted recommendations üéÅ
step7.description: Verified places with exclusive promo codes. Filter by category and open cards to see the map and available discounts.

step8.title: Packing planner üì¶
step8.description: Adjust the list to the season and length of stay. Add your own items and tick off what you have already packed so you don‚Äôt forget anything.

step9.title: Pre-trip task list üìù
step9.description: Reservations, documents, and formalities in one place. Tick completed tasks and follow your preparation progress.

step10.title: Special coupon üéÅ
step10.description: A quick shortcut to purchase the coupon with secure payment. Perfect if you want to use the offer without extra formalities.

step11.title: Car rental guide üöó
step11.description: Learn everything about renting a car in Cyprus: tips, insurance, and cost calculator üìä ‚Äì all in one place.

step12.title: Services and trip planning üó∫Ô∏è
step12.description: Meet our on-site team: private trips, tastings, and concierge support. Click to go to the WakacjeCypr.com offer.

step13.title: Sign in and save your progress! üîí
step13.description: Click "Sign in" to create an account and save your progress, badges, and achievements. You can also play as a guest without registering.

step14.title: Ready for the adventure? üéâ
step14.description: Click "üîÅ Show tutorial" in the footer to start this guide again at any time. Enjoy exploring Cyprus!

header.title: Packing planner
header.subtitle: Bring everything you need for Cyprus ‚Äì pick a season and tick items as you go.

panel.title: Packing planner
panel.subtitle: Choose your travel season and mark the items that will be useful in Cyprus.

packing.note: Tick items while packing ‚Äì refresh the list before the next trip.

spring.label: Spring
spring.summary: Mild days (17‚Äì28¬∞C) and crisp evenings. Pack layers and light rain protection.

summer.label: Summer
summer.summary: Temps over 30¬∞C, sea 26‚Äì27¬∞C, little rain. Choose airy fabrics and strong sun protection.

autumn.label: Autumn
autumn.summary: September can be hot; Oct‚ÄìNov 21‚Äì30¬∞C. Warm sea, occasional showers toward the end of the season.

winter.label: Winter
winter.summary: Coastline 15‚Äì18¬∞C, cool nights, possible snow in Troodos. It's the rainy season ‚Äì pack layers and waterproof gear.

documents.label: Passport or ID card
documents.hint: Carry your passport if you plan to cross to Northern Cyprus.

bookings.label: Tickets, vouchers, booking copies
bookings.hint: Keep digital and printed backups just in case.

insurance.label: Travel insurance and EHIC
insurance.hint: EHIC works in the south; you'll need private cover in the north.

money.label: Payment cards and euro cash
money.hint: Not every place accepts cards ‚Äì carry spare banknotes and coins.

driving.label: Driving licence and extra car insurance
driving.hint: Check rental rules if you plan to enter the north.

electronics.label: Phone with offline maps, charger, power bank
electronics.hint: Save important contacts and keep enough battery for full-day trips.

adapter.label: Type G plug adapter
adapter.hint: Cyprus uses UK-style sockets ‚Äì pack an adapter and a power strip.

firstAid.label: First aid kit
firstAid.hint: Prescription meds, plasters, sunburn relief, painkillers.

daypack.label: Daypack
daypack.hint: Light backpack for excursions and the beach, plus a dry bag.

comfort.label: Travel comfort
comfort.hint: Neck pillow, earplugs, eye mask, wet wipes.

layers.label: Layered T-shirts and a light jacket
layers.hint: Days are pleasantly warm, but mornings and evenings get cooler.

longSleeves.label: Long trousers and a long-sleeve sweatshirt
longSleeves.hint: Ideal in early March and for trips to the mountains.

shoes.label: Comfortable trainers or hiking shoes
shoes.hint: Perfect for lush Troodos trails and archaeological sites.

sunAccessories.label: Sunglasses and a hat
sunAccessories.hint: Spring sunshine can be intense while sightseeing.

sunscreen.label: SPF 30+ sunscreen
sunscreen.hint: Protect your skin even when temperatures feel moderate.

scarf.label: Light scarf or shawl
scarf.hint: Shields your neck from the sun and warms you during cooler evenings.

swimwear.label: Swimwear and quick-dry towel
swimwear.hint: By May the sea reaches about 20¬∞C and many hotels heat their pools.

rainProtection.label: Compact umbrella or thin rain jacket
rainProtection.hint: Passing showers are common at the beginning of spring.

camera.label: Camera or phone with free storage
camera.hint: Capture Cyprus in bloom‚Äîit is at its most photogenic now.

swimwear.label: At least two swimsuits
swimwear.hint: Rotate them without waiting for one to dry.

towel.label: Quick-dry beach towel or pareo
towel.hint: Works both at the seaside and by the hotel pool.

clothing.label: Lightweight natural-fabric clothing
clothing.hint: Cotton and linen handle 30¬∞C+ heat best.

footwear.label: Flip-flops, sandals and breathable shoes
footwear.hint: Pack comfy trainers too for longer outings.

sunscreen.label: SPF 30‚Äì50 sunscreen
sunscreen.hint: Apply generously and reapply after every swim.

hat.label: Wide-brim hat and UV sunglasses
hat.hint: Protects your head and eyes from heat stroke.

afterSun.label: After-sun lotion or aloe gel
afterSun.hint: Soothes the skin after a long day under the sun.

bottle.label: Insulated water bottle
bottle.hint: Keeps drinks cool and reminds you to hydrate regularly.

waterproofCase.label: Waterproof case for phone and electronics
waterproofCase.hint: Shields equipment from sand and water during sports.

coverUp.label: Light cover-up or shirt for evenings
coverUp.hint: Useful in the breeze or in air-conditioned rooms.

eveningLayer.label: Light jacket or sweater for evenings
eveningLayer.hint: October and November nights get cooler, especially by the sea.

trekkingShoes.label: Comfortable hiking or sports shoes
trekkingShoes.hint: Great for Akamas and Troodos excursions in autumn.

sandals.label: Flip-flops or sandals for the beach
sandals.hint: The sea stays pleasantly warm even in November.

sunAccessories.label: Sunglasses and head covering
sunAccessories.hint: The autumn sun still shines strongly.

sunscreen.label: SPF 30 sunscreen
sunscreen.hint: UV levels remain high despite lower air temperatures.

swimwear.label: Swimwear and beach towel
swimwear.hint: Beaches are quieter and the sea still invites you in.

camera.label: Camera for autumn landscapes
camera.hint: Vineyards and the Troodos mountains glow golden.

rainProtection.label: Umbrella or light rain poncho
rainProtection.hint: Late October can bring the first showers.

coat.label: Warm coat or jacket
coat.hint: A lighter one suits the coast, but mountains need winterwear.

layers.label: Layered sweaters, hoodies and long trousers
layers.hint: Helps you adapt to rapidly changing weather.

boots.label: Ankle boots with non-slip soles
boots.hint: Protect from rain and slippery surfaces.

rainProtection.label: Waterproof jacket or umbrella
rainProtection.hint: Winter is the rainiest period on the island.

accessories.label: Hat, scarf and gloves
accessories.hint: Essential in the mountains and on windy days.

sunglasses.label: Sunglasses
sunglasses.hint: Winter sun can dazzle, especially after rain or on snow.

equipmentPlan.label: Plan for renting winter gear
equipmentPlan.hint: If you ski on Olympus you can rent the heavier equipment locally.

header.title: Tasks to complete
header.subtitle: Prepare for the trip with missions that grant XP and keep your planning organised.

tasks.hint: Complete tasks to earn extra XP and prepare your Cyprus adventures.

details.typeCode: Ask the partner for a code and enter it below
details.typeLocation: Click "I'm here" when you arrive at the location

instruction.code: Ask staff for the code to earn XP!
instruction.location: Go to the location and click the button to earn XP!

sync.error: We couldn't sync this task right now. We'll retry once the connection is back.

referral.title: Referral Rewards
referral.subtitle: Invite friends and earn XP for every new user!

sunrise-challenge.title: Sunrise beach walk
sunrise-challenge.description: Wake up before sunrise and take a short stroll along one of Cyprus' beaches.

taste-halloumi.title: Try local halloumi
taste-halloumi.description: Visit a tavern and sample freshly grilled halloumi‚Äîlog the place in your travel journal.

nicosia-day-trip.title: Day trip to Nicosia
nicosia-day-trip.description: Plan a half-day visit to Cyprus' capital and step into at least one museum or gallery.

troodos-wine-route.title: Wine tasting in the mountains
troodos-wine-route.description: Use our Troodos Wine Route offer and book a tasting with driver through WakacjeCypr.com.

sea-adventure.title: Sea adventure in Cape Greco
sea-adventure.description: Choose one of our sea experiences (kayak, snorkel, cruise) and book it in Cape Greco.

nicosia-green-line-walk.title: Green Line walk
nicosia-green-line-walk.description: Discover Nicosia's division history on a walk with a local guide.

loukoumi-workshop.title: Loukoumi workshop in Geroskipou
loukoumi-workshop.description: Join a traditional sweets workshop and take home a souvenir set.

akamas-jeep-safari.title: Akamas 4x4 safari
akamas-jeep-safari.description: Use our 4x4 safari and visit Avakas Gorge and Lara Beach with a WakacjeCypr.com guide.

zenobia-dive-challenge.title: Zenobia wreck dive challenge
zenobia-dive-challenge.description: Join our organised dive on the Zenobia wreck with a licensed instructor and gear included.

troodos-stargazing.title: Night stargazing in Troodos
troodos-stargazing.description: Book our astronomy session in Troodos and count constellations over Mount Olympos with an expert.

limassol-bike-promenade.title: Bike the Molos promenade
limassol-bike-promenade.description: Rent a bike and ride at least 8 km along Limassol's seafront.

larnaca-art-walk.title: Larnaca art walk
larnaca-art-walk.description: Visit three galleries or murals and describe your favourite piece in the travel journal.

karpaz-donkey-care.title: Help at the donkey sanctuary
karpaz-donkey-care.description: Purchase our Karpas sanctuary volunteering and spend a morning feeding and grooming donkeys.

halloumi-farm-visit.title: Halloumi farm visit
halloumi-farm-visit.description: Book a halloumi farm visit via WakacjeCypr.com and learn the process from herding to tasting.

sunset-yoga-nissi.title: Sunset yoga at Nissi Beach
sunset-yoga-nissi.description: Sign up for a sunset yoga class and record a short audio story.

premium-car-rental.title: Airport car rental pickup
premium-car-rental.description: Use our car rental with full insurance and collect your vehicle at Paphos or Larnaca airport.

private-blue-lagoon-charter.title: Private Blue Lagoon charter
private-blue-lagoon-charter.description: Book an exclusive cruise or yacht from WakacjeCypr.com and explore Blue Lagoon with your own crew.

troodos-private-tour.title: Private Troodos tour
troodos-private-tour.description: Arrange a full-day Troodos mountains trip with our guide and comfortable transport.

nicosia-famagusta-combo.title: Nicosia & Famagusta combo tour
nicosia-famagusta-combo.description: Pick our combined package with a WakacjeCypr.com guide and see both sides of the island in one day.

family-waterpark-day.title: Family day at the waterpark
family-waterpark-day.description: Buy a family package to one of our recommended water parks with hotel transfers.

ayia-napa-sunset-cruise.title: Ayia Napa sunset cruise
ayia-napa-sunset-cruise.description: Book a romantic cruise with dinner and live music via WakacjeCypr.com.

wedding-photoshoot-cyprus.title: Wedding photoshoot in Cyprus
wedding-photoshoot-cyprus.description: Use our wedding & photo service and arrange an outdoor shoot with our photographer and stylist.

header.title: Media trips and VIP experiences
header.description: Private photo and video sessions by LilKangooMedia, a HolidayCyprus.com guide, and comfortable transport across the island.
header.subtitle: Book individual photo or video packages with the WakacjeCypr.com crew and instantly see the per-person cost for your group.

hero.title: Tailor-made Cyprus journeys crafted around your story
hero.description: We'll pick you up from the hotel, design a day full of highlights, and capture every moment with a professional photographer and videographer.

overview.title: Bespoke adventures ‚Äì just you, our guides, and Cyprus
overview.description: Every trip is personalised. We host up to four guests, arrange comfortable transport, and adjust the pace to your dream itinerary.

one.title: Personalised itinerary
one.description: We map out the programme together so you see the places that matter most ‚Äì from Ayia Napa coves to the Troodos mountains.

two.title: Comfortable transport
two.description: Hotel pickup and drop-off with air-conditioned rides and flexibility to stop wherever you wish.

three.title: Professional photo & video
three.description: The LilKangooMedia crew captures every emotion so you can relive the journey whenever you want.

four.title: Flexibility & support
four.description: Change plans on the fly while our local guides recommend hidden restaurants and secret viewpoints.

note.title: ‚Ä¶and below you'll find photo & video packages with a calculator!
note.description: Choose your trip format and use the calculator to see the exact price for your group.

packages.title: Choose photo or video format ‚Äì we handle the rest
packages.description: All packages include transport, professional crew, and a customised plan for up to four guests.
packages.intro: Base pricing covers up to 4 guests. Select a photo or video option and use the calculator below to see the total and per-person cost.

video.title: Films that tell your story
video.description: Dive into cinematic footage ‚Äì from dynamic reels to sweeping cliffside shots.

itineraries.title: Pick a starting region and explore suggested highlights
itineraries.description: We tailor times and attractions to your preferences ‚Äì here are inspirations for half- and full-day adventures.

one.title: 1. Half-day from Ayia Napa
one.description: Enjoy private transfers and returns to your hotel. With no extra guests we focus entirely on the places you care about most.

two.title: 2. Half-day from Paphos
two.description: Set the pace yourself. Pause for photo shoots, lunch, or extra stops for local produce whenever you wish.

three.title: 3. Full day from Ayia Napa
three.stop5: Ayia Napa ‚Äì Lovers' Bridge, Cape Greco, and marina
three.description: Blend mountains, seaside, and city vibes in one day. We'll point out our favourite lunch spots and artisan ice cream stops.

four.title: 4. Full day from Paphos
four.stop1: Paphos ‚Äì Aphrodite's Rock and Edro III shipwreck
four.description: Perfect for variety seekers. Chase sunsets in Paphos, golden light in Lefkara, and unwind by the salt lake in Larnaca.

cta.title: Contact us and plan your trip
cta.description: Every trip is bespoke ‚Äì message us and we'll prepare a tailored plan for your crew.

mediaTrips.intro: Choose a photo or video package, enter the number of participants, and see the total cost and price per person. Up to 4 people are covered by the base price; add more using the calculator below.

card.variantHelper: The calculator automatically updates the price and extra-person supplement.

vip-photo-trip.title: VIP photo trips
vip-photo-trip.description: Private photo sessions with a dedicated photographer and transport‚Äîperfect for families, couples, and friends.

highlights.transport: Premium transport with driver and locations planned for golden hour.
highlights.stylist: Stylist or make-up artist support available on request.

vip-video-trip.title: VIP video trips
vip-video-trip.description: Professional videographer, drone pilot, and video edit to capture your trip in premium quality.

highlights.crew: Video crew with drone pilot, sound, and social media edits.
highlights.promo: Possibility to produce promotional footage and behind-the-scenes coverage.

account.title: Account settings
account.subtitle: Update your login details or start the adventure from scratch.

password.guestNote: Guests don't have passwords ‚Äì sign in to update your account details.

password.loginRequired: Sign in to change your password.
password.tooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters long.

reset.loginRequired: Sign in to reset your progress.

success.progressReset: Progress reset. Good luck on your new adventure!

reset.title: Reset Statistics
reset.description: Start the adventure over ‚Äì reset includes experience, badges, visited places, and tasks.

username.heading: Change Username
username.desc: Set an ID visible in rankings, comments, and travel journal.
username.label: New username
username.hint: Allowed letters, numbers, dots, hyphens, underscores (3‚Äì30 chars).

displayName.heading: Display Name
displayName.desc: This name appears in notifications and app greetings.
displayName.label: Name

password.heading: Update Password
password.desc: Use a strong password to protect your account.
password.hint: Password must be at least 8 characters with mixed letters and numbers.

security.guestNote: Guests do not have passwords ‚Äì sign in to change account details.

rules.usage: Each coupon is valid once per partner ‚Äì you can redeem discounts with multiple providers, but only once at a given location.
rules.groupIntro: Some discounts cover the whole group, others just one person ‚Äì see the details next to each offer:

groupStay.html: ‚úÖ Lefkara accommodation ‚Äì15% or ‚Äì20% is calculated from the total stay price.

rules.named: The coupon is personal and indivisible ‚Äì you can't split one discount between several transactions.
rules.show: Show the coupon before using the service ‚Äì on your phone or printed out.
rules.combine: Discounts can't be combined with other promos or codes ‚Äì the better option applies.
rules.verify: Partners may verify coupon validity ‚Äì once used, the discount is marked as redeemed.
rules.cash: Coupons can't be exchanged for cash ‚Äì they are a bonus, not a payment method.

offers.title: Where you can redeem the discount
offers.subtitle: The coupon works with partners across the island. Pick a service, share the coupon number and claim the discount on site or during online booking.

search.empty: No partners found for that phrase. Try another keyword.

how.title: How to buy a coupon?
how.subtitle: Follow these steps to redeem discounts and jump to Stripe checkout. Each stage takes just a moment.

step1.title: Order the coupon
step1.description: Use the link above to pick how many people the coupon should cover.

noteMultiple.html: When should you buy multiple coupons? For larger groups (e.g. a cruise or tour) when everyone should get the discount.

noteSingle.html: When is one coupon enough? If you only plan to use car and transport discounts.

step2.title: Check your email
step2.description: Enter your email during payment. Within five minutes you'll receive a ready-to-use coupon for different services on the island.

step3.title: Redeem the coupon
step3.description: Each coupon has a unique number. Enter it in online forms or show it to partners on site. You can use one coupon once per partner during your trip.

coupon.title: Special Coupon ‚Äî quick booking

coupon.smallprint: You'll receive the coupon within a few minutes at the email used during payment.

carRental.meta.title: Choose your city ‚Äì CyprusEye car rental
carRental.brand.title: Car rental
carRental.hero.title: Choose your pick-up location
carRental.hero.description: We prepared two offers tailored to your travel plans. Choose the region where you need a car and we will show you the fleet, cost calculator, and booking form.
carRental.hero.note: You can switch between offers at any time ‚Äì the link is available at the top of the page.
carRental.hero.info.depositDetails: Both locations have no deposit and include Polish-language support.
carRental.hero.info.deliveryDetails: Pick up your car at the airport, hotel, or another agreed location.
carRental.hero.info.supportDetails: Round-the-clock support regardless of which offer you choose.
carRental.offers.title: Two offers, one standard
carRental.offers.subtitle: Choose your starting city and we will show you available cars and prices.
carRental.offers.larnaca.title: Pick-up in Larnaca or delivery across the island
carRental.offers.larnaca.description: Perfect if you land in Larnaca and want to explore different regions of the island. You can pick up the car at the airport or have it delivered to selected resorts.
carRental.offers.larnaca.itemOne: Delivery to Ayia Napa, Protaras, Limassol, and Nicosia
carRental.offers.larnaca.itemTwo: Full insurance and family extras included in the price
carRental.offers.larnaca.itemThree: Cost calculator and online booking form
carRental.offers.larnaca.ctaAria: Go to the island-wide car rental offer
carRental.offers.paphos.title: Pick-up at PFO airport or at your hotel with no extra fees
carRental.offers.paphos.description: Choose the dedicated Paphos offer if you want a convenient pick-up with no extra fees and optional delivery to nearby resorts.
carRental.offers.paphos.itemOne: Paphos airport and city centre without extra fees
carRental.offers.paphos.itemTwo: Delivery to Coral Bay and Polis for a small surcharge
carRental.offers.paphos.itemThree: Polish support 24/7 and a transparent rental calculator
carRental.footer: Contact us in the app or by phone ‚Äì we will help you choose the best car.
carRental.page.brand.logoAlt: WakacjeCypr.com ‚Äì turtle logo with Polish flag
carRental.page.brand.title: Car rental
carRental.page.hero.title: Car rental across Cyprus
carRental.page.hero.description: Discover the WakacjeCypr.com fleet, order a car with pickup at the airport or at your hotel, and calculate the cost with a transparent calculator.
carRental.page.hero.paphosNote.prefix: Looking for a car in Paphos with no pickup surcharge? Use the "Paphos offer" button at the top of the page or
carRental.page.hero.paphosNote.link: go directly to the dedicated offer
carRental.page.fleet.title: Rent a car across Cyprus
carRental.page.fleet.description: Pick up the car where your adventure begins ‚Äì at the airport, at your hotel, or in any town on the island. All vehicles include comprehensive insurance, a free additional driver, and child seats.
carRental.page.benefits.package.title: Included package
carRental.page.benefits.package.body: No deposit, comprehensive insurance with excess up to ‚Ç¨500, 24/7 roadside assistance, a second driver, and child seats ‚Äì all included in the rental price.
carRental.page.benefits.flexible.title: Flexible pickup and return
carRental.page.benefits.flexible.body: We will deliver the car in Larnaca free of charge or to Nicosia, Ayia Napa, Protaras, Limassol, and Paphos for a fixed fee according to the pricelist ‚Äì you can calculate everything in the calculator.
carRental.page.benefits.nature.title: We support nature
carRental.page.benefits.nature.body: For every rental day we donate ‚Ç¨1 to the protection of Cypriot sea turtles.
carRental.page.included.title: Included as standard
carRental.page.addons.title: Available extras
carRental.page.addons.fullInsurance: Full comprehensive insurance with no excess ‚Äì ‚Ç¨17/day.
carRental.page.addons.delivery: Pickup/return outside Larnaca: Nicosia or Ayia Napa +‚Ç¨15, Protaras or Limassol +‚Ç¨20, Paphos +‚Ç¨40.
carRental.page.requirements.title: Driver requirements

carRental.page.requirements.license.html: Driving licence held for at least 3 years or age 25+.

carRental.page.requirements.youngDriver: Younger driver or driving for less than 3 years: +‚Ç¨10/day.
carRental.page.calculator.title: Rental calculator
carRental.page.calculator.description: Check the exact rental cost including extras and delivery fees.
carRental.page.reservation.title: Place a reservation
carRental.page.reservation.description: Fill in the online form to confirm availability and receive the contract. You can also write to us on WhatsApp ‚Äì we reply as quickly as possible.
carRental.page.reservation.formLink: Open the form in a new window
carRental.page.reservation.confirmationN: You will receive confirmation by email within 24 hours.
carRental.page.reservation.successMessag: Your reservation form has been sent successfully.
carRental.page.footer: ¬© WakacjeCypr.com ‚Ä¢ Car rental in Cyprus with Polish support.

sos.description: Quick access to emergency numbers, embassy contacts, and medical guidance.

eu.html: EU emergency number (police, ambulance, fire). Call now

cyprus.html: Cypriot emergency number ‚Äì works alongside 112. Call

police.html: 24/7 police line (dial the full code when abroad). Call

address.html: 14, Ifigenias Street, 2007 Nicosia ‚Ä¢ Get directions

healthcare.title: üè• Closest medical help
healthcare.sos.healthcare.title: üè• Closest medical help

sos.healthcare.hospital.html: 24/7 emergency department, Anavargos, Paphos. +357 26 803 000 ‚Ä¢ Directions

sos.healthcare.search.html: Open the hospital list on Google Maps and share your location to see nearby options.

sos.healthcare.pharmacy.html: Check duty pharmacies on the Ministry of Health website or search for a pharmacy nearby.

healthcare.note: In life-threatening situations always call 112 and clearly state your location. Enable location sharing in the app to find help faster on the map.

kato-pafos-archaeological-park.name: Kato Paphos Archaeological Park (Nea Paphos)
kato-pafos-archaeological-park.description: Expansive UNESCO site with famous mosaics and the ruins of the ancient city of Nea Paphos.

tombs-of-the-kings.name: Tombs of the Kings in Paphos
tombs-of-the-kings.description: Monumental rock-cut tombs from the Hellenistic and Roman periods adorned with Doric columns.

coral-bay.name: Coral Bay Beach
coral-bay.description: Golden sand, gentle entry into the sea and crystal-clear water‚Äîthe classic spot to relax near Peyia.

aphrodite-rock.name: Aphrodite's Rock (Petra tou Romiou)
aphrodite-rock.description: Legend says Aphrodite was born among the turquoise waves at this rock‚Äîa perfect sunset viewpoint.

blue-lagoon-akamas.name: Blue Lagoon (Akamas)
blue-lagoon-akamas.description: Crystal-clear bay surrounded by the wild nature of the Akamas peninsula‚Äîa snorkelling paradise.

kourion-archaeological-site.name: Kourion Archaeological Site
kourion-archaeological-site.description: Clifftop ruins of an ancient city with a theatre, baths and mosaics from the House of Eustolios.

kolossi-castle.name: Kolossi Castle
kolossi-castle.description: 13th-century Hospitaller fortress that once oversaw the production of Commandaria sweet wine.

molos-promenade.name: Molos Promenade in Limassol
molos-promenade.description: Seaside park lined with palms, sculptures and caf√©s‚Äîthe residents' favourite stroll in Limassol.

amathus-ruins.name: Ancient Amathus Ruins
amathus-ruins.description: Remains of one of Cyprus' royal cities with an agora, Temple of Aphrodite and early Christian basilica.

limassol-castle.name: Limassol Castle (Medieval Museum)
limassol-castle.description: Stone castle in the heart of the old town, now home to a collection of medieval artefacts.

saint-lazarus-church.name: Church of Saint Lazarus in Larnaca
saint-lazarus-church.description: 9th-century stone church built over Saint Lazarus' tomb, famed for its ornate iconostasis.

larnaca-salt-lake-hala-sultan.name: Larnaca Salt Lake and Hala Sultan Tekke
larnaca-salt-lake-hala-sultan.description: Winter flamingos and the mystical Hala Sultan Tekke mosque shape a unique lakeside landscape.

finikoudes-beach.name: Finikoudes Beach in Larnaca
finikoudes-beach.description: City beach with a palm-lined promenade, lively caf√©s and a gentle entry into the sea.

chirokitia-archaeological-site.name: Choirokoitia Archaeological Site
chirokitia-archaeological-site.description: UNESCO-listed Neolithic settlement with reconstructions of circular stone dwellings.

lefkara-village.name: Lefkara Village
lefkara-village.description: Mountain village famed for lefkaritiko lace and silver handicrafts in stone houses.

nissi-beach.name: Nissi Beach (Ayia Napa)
nissi-beach.description: Bright sand, shallow lagoon and the Nissi islet make it an icon of leisure and water sports.

cape-greco.name: Cape Greco
cape-greco.description: National park of cliffs, sea caves and the famous natural Bridge of Lovers.

fig-tree-bay.name: Fig Tree Bay Beach (Protaras)
fig-tree-bay.description: Azure bay with golden sand and a solitary fig tree symbolising the area.

ayia-napa-monastery.name: Ayia Napa Monastery
ayia-napa-monastery.description: 17th-century monastery with a courtyard and sycamore‚Äîa spiritual oasis in lively Ayia Napa.

ayia-napa-sculpture-park.name: Ayia Napa Sculpture Park
ayia-napa-sculpture-park.description: Open-air art gallery with over a hundred sculptures overlooking the sea and a neighbouring cactus park.

troodos-olympos.name: Mount Olympus (Olympos)
troodos-olympos.description: Cyprus' highest peak with the Artemis trail in summer and ski slopes in winter.

kykkos-monastery.name: Kykkos Monastery
kykkos-monastery.description: Cyprus' wealthiest monastery with mosaics, golden icons and a sacred art museum.

omodos-village.name: Omodos Village (Centre)
omodos-village.description: Historic village with the Holy Cross Monastery, cobbled lanes and local crafts.

kakopetria-village.name: Kakopetria Village
kakopetria-village.description: Mountain settlement with traditional houses and a stream‚Äîperfect for Troodos walks.

caledonia-waterfall.name: Caledonia Waterfall
caledonia-waterfall.description: One of Cyprus' highest cascades hidden in a shaded gorge near Platres.

kyrenia-old-harbour.name: Kyrenia Old Harbour (Girne)
kyrenia-old-harbour.description: Historic harbour with tavernas and yachts beneath the medieval castle, lively after dark.

kyrenia-castle.name: Kyrenia Castle
kyrenia-castle.description: Venetian fortress with a shipwreck museum and views over the harbour and Mediterranean Sea.

st-hilarion-castle.name: St Hilarion Castle
st-hilarion-castle.description: Mountain fortress spread across three rocky levels with legendary coastal views.

famagusta-old-town.name: Famagusta Old Town (Gazimaƒüusa)
famagusta-old-town.description: Fortified city with Venetian walls, St Nicholas Cathedral and Othello Castle by the port.

karpaz-golden-beach.name: Golden Beach on the Karpas Peninsula
karpaz-golden-beach.description: Wild, wide beach of fine sand framed by dunes and roaming wild donkeys.

zenobia-wreck.name: Zenobia Wreck
zenobia-wreck.description: Sunken ferry off Larnaca's coast‚Äîone of the island's most famous dive sites.

avakas-gorge.name: Avakas Gorge
avakas-gorge.description: Dramatic canyon on the Akamas peninsula with towering rock formations and trekking paths.

aphrodites-baths.name: Baths of Aphrodite
aphrodites-baths.description: Romantic natural pool on the Akamas peninsula linked to the legend of Aphrodite.

polis-latchi-marina.name: Polis & Latchi Marina
polis-latchi-marina.description: Coastal town and marina serving as the launch point for cruises to the Blue Lagoon.

st-hilarion-vantage-point.name: St Hilarion Castle Viewpoint
st-hilarion-vantage-point.description: Lookout below St Hilarion Castle with sweeping views across the Kyrenia coast.

buffavento-castle.name: Buffavento Castle
buffavento-castle.description: Hilltop castle ruins overlooking the Mediterranean, near the St Hilarion stronghold.

lania-village.name: Lania Village
lania-village.description: Picturesque settlement at the foot of Troodos known for winemaking, galleries and a tranquil pace.

trooditissa-monastery.name: Trooditissa Monastery
trooditissa-monastery.description: Mountain monastery in the Troodos range surrounded by forests, icons and pilgrims.

soli-ancient-site.name: Ancient City of Soli
soli-ancient-site.description: Ruins of an ancient city with an amphitheatre and remnants of the harbour near Famagusta.

limassol-municipal-aquarium.name: Limassol Municipal Aquarium
limassol-municipal-aquarium.description: Intimate educational aquarium showcasing local marine life and conservation programmes.

dasoudi-beach.name: Dasoudi Beach
dasoudi-beach.description: Sandy beach in Limassol with a coastal park, walking paths and shady green areas.

governors-beach.name: Governor's Beach
governors-beach.description: Beach between Limassol and Larnaca with white rocks, mixed sand and gravel, and reefs near the shore.

macronissos-beach.name: Macronissos Beach
macronissos-beach.description: Sheltered bay with pale sand and calm waters near Ayia Napa‚Äîideal for families.

yeroskipou-town.name: Yeroskipou (Kouklia)
yeroskipou-town.description: Town near Paphos with Agios Georgios church and the island's famous pastelli sweets.

agios-neophytos-monastery.name: Agios Neophytos Monastery
agios-neophytos-monastery.description: Hermit monastery carved into the rock, decorated with frescoes founded by Saint Neophytos.

vouni-ancient-house.name: Ancient Assembly House in Vouni
vouni-ancient-house.description: Hilltop archaeological ruins at Vouni overlooking the bays and former royal residences.

nicosia-archaeological-museum.name: Nicosia Archaeological Museum
nicosia-archaeological-museum.description: Museum tracing Cyprus' history from prehistory to the Middle Ages with a rich artefact collection.

buyuk-han.name: B√ºy√ºk Han in Nicosia
buyuk-han.description: Ottoman-era caravanserai courtyard filled with artisan workshops and caf√©s.

ledra-street.name: Ledra Street and Gate
ledra-street.description: One of Old Nicosia's main streets crossing the Green Line between south and north.

eleftheria-square.name: Eleftheria Square
eleftheria-square.description: Zaha Hadid-designed square in Nicosia that bridges the city's historic and contemporary layers.

anexartisias-street.name: Anexartisias Street in Limassol
anexartisias-street.description: Limassol's main shopping street, loved by locals and visitors for boutiques and caf√©s.

fasouri-watermania.name: Fasouri Watermania Waterpark
fasouri-watermania.description: Cyprus' largest waterpark with numerous slides, themed pools and relaxation zones.

akamas-national-park.name: Akamas National Park
akamas-national-park.description: Expansive wilderness with viewpoints, trails and turtle nesting beaches.

panagia-kykkos-viewpoint.name: Panagia Kykkos Monastery Viewpoint
panagia-kykkos-viewpoint.description: High viewpoint beside Kykkos Monastery with panoramic Troodos mountain vistas.

troodos-square.name: Troodos Square
troodos-square.description: Central hub of the Troodos mountains with trailheads and a winter ski base.

avakas-gorge-west-entrance.name: Avakas Gorge West Entrance
avakas-gorge-west-entrance.description: Alternative entry to Avakas Gorge offering quieter trekking and different rock formations.

cape-greco-sea-caves.name: Cape Greco Sea Caves
cape-greco-sea-caves.description: Spectacular sea caves in the cliffs of Cape Greco, reachable by boat, kayak or snorkel.

cyprus-museum.name: Cyprus Museum in Nicosia
cyprus-museum.description: Cyprus' national archaeological museum with collections spanning every historical era.

attractions.subtitle: Filter places according to your travel plans, check distances, and see unlock status. Clicking any card opens the map with the highlighted point in the main app.

attractions.footer: ¬© HolidayCyprus.com ‚Äì Find your next adventure in Cyprus.

hero.title: VIP individual trips
hero.intro: Every itinerary is tailored to your expectations‚Äîfrom private cruises and wine tastings to villa weekends with 24/7 support.
hero.ctaPrimaryAria: Book a call with the HolidayCyprus concierge
hero.ctaSecondaryAria: Send an email to the HolidayCyprus team
hero.visualLabel: Illustration of a private trip in Cyprus

points.transport: We organise private trips: hotel pickup, comfortable transport and drop-off once the itinerary ends.
points.personal: Only your group travels with us, so we adapt to your preferences throughout the day.
points.photography: Optionally a professional LilKangooMedia photographer joins to capture premium photos.

photo.title: ‚ÄúPhoto Trip‚Äù packages

items.halfDay: Half day (up to 5 h): ‚Ç¨400 for groups up to 4, up to 30 photos; each additional person +‚Ç¨100.
items.threeQuarterDay: 3/4 day (up to 8 h): ‚Ç¨500 for up to 4 people, up to 50 photos; +‚Ç¨125 per person.
items.fullDay: Full day (up to 10 h): ‚Ç¨600 for up to 4 people, up to 60 photos; +‚Ç¨150 per person.
items.twoDays: 2 days (up to 20 h): ‚Ç¨1,100 for up to 4 people, up to 120 photos; +‚Ç¨275 per person.

photo.note: How to calculate the price? total price = base price + max(0, people ‚Äì 4) √ó supplement.

items.halfDay: Half day (up to 5 h): ‚Ç¨800 for groups up to 4, film up to 3 min; +‚Ç¨200 per person.
items.threeQuarterDay: 3/4 day (up to 8 h): ‚Ç¨900 for up to 4 people, film up to 4 min; +‚Ç¨225 per person.
items.fullDay: Full day (up to 10 h): ‚Ç¨1,000 for up to 4 people, film up to 5 min + 2 reels for FB/IG; +‚Ç¨250 per person.
items.twoDays: 2 days (up to 20 h): ‚Ç¨1,800 for up to 4 people, film up to 10 min + 5 reels for FB/IG; +‚Ç¨450 per person.

itineraries.title: Sample day plans

items.halfDayAyia: Half day ‚Äì Ayia Napa: Love Bridge, Cape Greco, Lefkara (wine tasting), Salt Lake in Larnaca.
items.halfDayPaphos: Half day ‚Äì Paphos: Aphrodite‚Äôs Rock, Edro III wreck, white cliffs, Zapallo Bay.
items.fullDayAyia: Full day ‚Äì Ayia Napa: Lefkara, Zapallo Bay, Limassol (Promenade, Marina), Salt Lake and Aqueduct in Larnaca, Love Bridge, Cape Greco, New Marina.
items.fullDayPaphos: Full day ‚Äì Paphos: Aphrodite‚Äôs Rock, Edro III wreck, white cliffs, Zapallo Bay, Limassol Promenade and Marina, Lefkara, Salt Lake and Aqueduct.

itineraries.note: Each trip starts and ends with hotel pickup and the schedule stays flexible.

notes.label: Additional information
notes.placeholder: Describe favourite spots, dietary needs, logistics...

price.empty: Estimated price will appear after choosing a package.

highlights.title: Why travel with us
highlights.subtitle: From the first call to your return home, your concierge coordinates logistics, reservations, and discreet special touches.

exclusive.title: Exclusive scenarios
exclusive.description: Private cruises, vineyard tastings, secluded beaches, and bespoke routes away from mass tourism.

concierge.title: 24/7 concierge team
concierge.description: A dedicated host manages schedules, transport, translation, and recommendations‚Äîin Polish and English.

media.title: Professional media coverage
media.description: Photo and video storytelling from your trip, drone shots, and the option for same-day delivery.

contact.title: Contact the VIP team
contact.subtitle: Tell us what you expect from your trip‚Äîwe will prepare tailored concepts within 24 hours.

vip.footer: ¬© HolidayCyprus.com ‚Äì Your private journey across Cyprus.

brand.title: Car rental

hero.title: Car rental in Paphos with no hidden fees
hero.description: Explore the fleet available in Paphos, pick up the car at PFO airport or your hotel, and for shorter rentals just add the small airport fees. The calculator below reveals the final price with every extra.

note.prefix: Planning to tour the whole island? Use the ‚ÄúIsland-wide offer‚Äù button at the top of the page or
note.link: view the fleet available across Cyprus

fleet.title: Rent a car in Paphos and nearby
fleet.description: We deliver cars to Paphos Airport or your hotel with no deposit. Rentals of 7+ days include free airport/hotel transfer, while shorter bookings add only ‚Ç¨10 for pickup and ‚Ç¨10 for return. Child seats and 24/7 Polish support stay included, and full AC cover is available for ‚Ç¨17/day.

package.title: Package included
package.body: The standard offer covers zero deposit, 24/7 Polish-speaking assistance, and complimentary child seats ‚Äì see the ‚ÄúPrices | Fleet | Extras‚Äù section for details.

flexible.title: Flexible pickup and return
flexible.body: Paphos Airport, city centre, or your hotel‚Äîrentals of 7+ days stay free, while shorter bookings only add the ‚Ç¨10 airport pickup and ‚Ç¨10 return fee. We can also deliver to Coral Bay or Polis on request.

nature.title: We support nature
nature.body: For every rental day we donate ‚Ç¨1 to conserve Cyprus‚Äô marine turtles.

addons.title: Available extras
addons.fullInsurance: Full AC insurance with zero excess ‚Äì ‚Ç¨17/day.
addons.delivery: Delivery to Coral Bay / Pegeia +‚Ç¨10, Polis / Latchi +‚Ç¨15.
addons.airportShortRental: Bookings under 7 days with PFO airport pickup ‚Äì one-off ‚Ç¨10 fee.

requirements.title: Driver requirements
requirements.license: Driving licence held for at least 3 years or age 25+.
requirements.youngDriver: Young driver or licence under 3 years: +‚Ç¨10/day.

calculator.title: Rental calculator
calculator.description: Check the exact rental price together with extras and delivery fees.

form.message: No deposit, child seats always included for free.

feature2.description: Pickup and return in Paphos or at PFO airport without extra fees.

feature3.description: Extra driver and child seats included.

carRentalPfo.includedMessage: Included: no deposit, Paphos pickup ‚Ç¨0, extra driver and seats included.

mitsubishi-mirage-paphos.note: Agile, economical choice ideal for Paphos‚Äô narrow streets.

toyota-vitz-paphos.note: Comfortable hatchback with a roomy interior for family outings.

toyota-aygo-paphos.note: Perfect for short beach drives and parking in the centre.

honda-fit-paphos.note: Adjustable seats let you easily fit a stroller or beach gear.

mazda-premacy-paphos.note: Practical minivan for larger families travelling around western Cyprus.

mazda-cx5-paphos.note: Higher ground clearance and a comfortable cabin suit excursions around Akamas.

mitsubishi-outlander-paphos.note: Excellent for groups planning full-day trips around Paphos and nearby areas.

nissan-serena-paphos.note: Best option for larger groups or whenever you need extra luggage space.

advertise.title: Advertising partnerships

hero.title: Reach travellers before they land in Cyprus
hero.description: We publish guides, task lists, and coupons used by thousands of Polish and international travellers. Complete the form and our team will prepare a package tailored to your brand.

form.title: Introduce your brand
form.subtitle: Tell us about your service and we will prepare a visibility proposal across CyprusEye and WakacjeCypr.
form.name: Full name*

advertise.footer: We collaborate with transport providers, hotels, attractions, and lifestyle brands. We will make sure your offer is visible to travellers choosing Cyprus.

cruise.footer: We offer sunset cruises, Blue Lagoon snorkelling, family outings, and exclusive sea events. We'll reach out as soon as the calendar opens.
